titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1997) to amend title 18, United States Code, and the Uniform Code of Military Justice to protect unborn children from assault and murder, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-427, by Mr. Linder.

The amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on the Judiciary now printed in the bill, modified by the amendment printed in part A of the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution, shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 147.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 529.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/25/2004--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1997) (Unborn Victims of Violence Act of 2004 or Laci and Conner's Law).
